Headline: Temporary #94 South California Reroute at California/60th
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted near California/60th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 59th, Western, 63rd, California, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near California/60th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays on Loop 'L' (elevated lines)
ShortDescription: Pink and Purple Line trains are experiencing delays due to signal problems near Clark/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple and Pink Line trains will be rerouted to the Outer Loop (trains will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Clark/Lake, State/Lake, Washington/Wabash, Adams/Wabash, Library/State-Van Buren, LaSalle/Van Buren, Quincy/Wells and Washington/Wells).

Crews are working to correct the problem.

Allow extra travel time.
